metadata.title: CVE-2018-4919 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 28.0.0.161 and earlier have an exploitable useafter free vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrarycode execution in the context of the current user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 29.0.0.140ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 29.0.0.140ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '29.0.0.140ubuntu0.14.04.1').
